Enter a number: AND:    0b00000000000000000000000000001010 & 0b01101111001000100010110000101000 = 0b00000000000000000000000000001000
OR:     0b00000000000000000000000000001010 | 0b01101111001000100010110000101000 = 0b01101111001000100010110000101010
XOR:    0b00000000000000000000000000001010 ^ 0b01101111001000100010110000101000 = 0b01101111001000100010110000100010
NOT:    ~0b00000000000000000000000000001010         = 0b11111111111111111111111111110101
RIGHT SHIFT: 0b00000000000000000000000000001010 >> 1          = 0b00000000000000000000000000000101
LEFT SHIFT:  0b00000000000000000000000000001010 << 1          = 0b00000000000000000000000000010100
ROTATE RIGHT:  0b00000000000000000000000000001010 >> 1          = 0b00000000000000000000000000000101
ROTATE LEFT:  0b00000000000000000000000000001010 << 1          = 0b00000000000000000000000000000000
